attributes.action: Bring back Bernard Hogan-Howe alongside Boris for a safer London once & for all.
attributes.additional_details:
'Together, we cut crime by 20%, cut knife crime by 17% and halved the murder rate.'
- @borisjohnsonmp Instagram, referring to himself and Bernard.

An outstanding achievement in comparison to the unfortunate lack thereof currently.

Crime came down by 40% in Merseyside under Hogan-Howe. The murder rate was halved as mentioned above in his time in London.

This is what the people need.

Bernard, we urge you.
(But, if not, at least get rid of Cressida!)

Back change.

Back the likes of Bernard.
attributes.background:
Bernard Hogan-Howe.

One of the toughest proven crime fighters to have led the Metropolitan Police in recent years.

Hogan-Howe cut crime by around 40% as Chief Constable of Merseyside. The murder rate was halved in his time in London and more.

We need change. And we need it now.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. This includes petitions asking for people to be given jobs.
